description: This source file defines the FavoritesFragment class, which manages and displays the user's favorite restaurants within the app. It integrates with the FavoritesRepository to observe changes in favorite restaurant IDs, and utilizes a RecyclerView with a RestaurantAdapter to show the list.

classes.name: FavoritesFragment
classes.description: Fragment that displays a list of favorite restaurants, observing repository data and providing navigation via activity.

methods.name: onAttach
methods.description: Initializes the RestaurantAdapter with callbacks for click and favorite toggle actions.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up RecyclerView and observes changes in favorite restaurant IDs to update the list.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of FavoritesFragment.
